title: Broadcasting rights revenue of European soccer leagues 2017/2018
summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Revenue in million euros in each Country on the y axis.
The Revenue in million euros is highest at Country England and lowest at Country Austria.
The highest Country England has 3188.0 more Revenue in million euros than the lowest Country Austria.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue in million euros for 15 number of Countrys.
Country England has the highest Revenue in million euros and Austria has the lowest Revenue in million euros.
The second highest Revenue in million euros is appeared to be the Country Spain.
The highest value at Country England is 145.91x times more than the lowest value at Austria.
Revenue in million euros at Country England is 3210.0 , second place is Spain at 1609.0, and thirdly is Italy at 1294.0.
The Country Austria tends to be 5.23 percent lower than average.
The Revenue in million euros is 9206.0 if we add up values of all Countrys.
